sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: شعرت الصين بالأضرار التي لحقت بالاقتصاد العالمي: وفقًا لتقرير إعلامي في 16 مارس، تضرر الاقتصاد الصيني بشدة في الشهرين الأولين من عام 2020 بسبب الإجراءات التي اتخذتها الحكومة للحد من انتشار الفيروس، وانخفضت مبيعات تجارة التجزئة بـ 20.5%.
en-mt: China felt the damage to the global economy: According to a media report on March 16, the Chinese economy was hit hard in the first two months of 2020 by measures taken by the government to curb the spread of the virus, and retail sales fell by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: نظرًا لأن بر الصين الرئيسي يعد مركزًا اقتصاديًا وصناعيًا رئيسيًا، فقد لوحظ أن تفشي الفيروس يشكل تهديدًا كبيرًا مزعزعًا لاستقرار الاقتصاد العالمي.
en-mt: Since mainland China is a major economic and industrial hub, the outbreak has been noted to pose a significant destabilizing threat to the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: توقعت أغاثا ديماريس من وحدة الاستخبارات الاقتصادية أن تظل الأسواق متقلبة حتى تظهر صورة أوضح عن النتائج المحتملة.
en-mt: Agatha Demaris of the Economist Intelligence Unit predicted that markets will remain volatile until a clearer picture of the possible outcomes emerges.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: في يناير 2020، قدر بعض المحللين أن التداعيات الاقتصادية للوباء على النمو العالمي يمكن أن تتجاوز تلك التي حدثت نتيجة تفشي سارس بين عامي 2002 و2004.
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic repercussions of the pandemic on global growth could exceed those that occurred as a result of the SARS outbreak between 2002 and 2004.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: قدر خبير في جامعة واشنطن في سانت لويس تأثر سلسلة التوريد العالمية بأكثر من 300 مليار دولار والذي يمكن أن يستمر حتى عامين.
en-mt: An expert at Washington University in St. Louis estimated that the global supply chain was affected by more than $300 billion which could last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: أفادت تقارير أن منظمة البلدان المصدرة للنفط (الأوبك) شهدت "اختلالًا" بعد انخفاض حاد في أسعار النفط بسبب انخفاض الطلب من الصين.
en-mt: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has reportedly experienced an "imbalance" after a sharp drop in oil prices due to lower demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: تراجعت أسواق الأسهم العالمية في 24 فبراير بسبب الارتفاع الكبير في عدد حالات كوفيد-19 خارج بر الصين الرئيسي.
en-mt: Global stock markets fell on February 24 due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: في 27 فبراير، وبسبب المخاوف المتزايدة بشأن تفشي فيروس كورونا، سجلت العديد من مؤشرات الأسهم الأمريكية، بما فيها ناسداك-100، وستاندرد آند بورز 500، ومتوسط داو جونز الصناعي أكبر انخفاض لها منذ عام 2008، مع انخفاض داو 1,191 نقطة، وهو أكبر انخفاض له في يوم واحد منذ الأزمة المالية في عام 2007–08.
en-mt: On February 27, due to growing concerns about the coronavirus outbreak, several US stock indices, including the Nasdaq-100, S&P 500, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average recorded their biggest decline since 2008, with the Dow down 1,191 points, its largest one-day decline since the 2007–08 financial crisis.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: أنهت المؤشرات الثلاثة الأسبوع بانخفاض بأكثر من 10%.
en-mt: All three indices ended the week down more than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: في 28 فبراير، أكدت سكوب راتينغز جي إم بي إتش التصنيف الائتماني السيادي للصين، لكنها أبقت على التوقعات السلبية.
en-mt: On February 28, Scoop Resengs GMBH confirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained the negative outlook.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: تراجعت الأسهم مرة أخرى بسبب المخاوف من فيروس كورونا، وكان أكبر انخفاض في 16 مارس.
en-mt: Stocks fell again due to coronavirus fears, the biggest drop was on March 16.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: يعتقد الكثيرون أن الركود الاقتصادي محتمل.
en-mt: Many believe that economic stagnation is possible.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: أشاد الخبير الاقتصادي محمد العريان بالتدابير الطارئة التي تتخذها البنوك المركزية والدول في الوقت المناسب.
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised the emergency measures taken by central banks and countries in a timely manner.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: تستجيب البنوك المركزية بشكل أسرع مما كانت عليه في ظل الانهيار المالي في 2008.
en-mt: Central banks are responding faster than they did during the 2008 financial meltdown.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: تُعد السياحة أحد القطاعات الأكثر تضررًا بسبب حظر السفر، وإغلاق الأماكن العامة بما فيها مناطق الجذب السياحي، وتحذير الحكومات من السفر في جميع أنحاء العالم.
en-mt: Tourism is one of the sectors hardest hit by travel bans, closures of public places including tourist attractions, and warnings to governments against traveling around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: نتيجة لذلك، ألغت العديد من شركات الطيران رحلاتها بسبب انخفاض الطلب، بما فيها الخطوط الجوية البريطانية، والخطوط الجوية الصينية الشرقية، وكانتس، في حين انهارت شركة الطيران الإقليمية البريطانية، فلاي بي.
en-mt: As a result, several airlines cancelled flights due to low demand, including British Airways, China Eastern and Qantas, while British regional airline, FlyBe, collapsed.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: كان التأثير على صناعة خطوط الرحلات البحرية عند مستوى لم يسبق له مثيل.
en-mt: The impact on the cruise line industry has been at an unprecedented level.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: أُغلقت العديد من محطات القطارات وموانئ العبارات أيضًا.
en-mt: Many train stations and ferry ports were also closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: تزامن الوباء مع موسم السفر في عيد الربيع المعروف بـ Chunyun، وهو موسم السفر الرئيسي المرتبط بعطلة رأس السنة الصينية الجديدة.
en-mt: The pandemic coincided with the travel season of the Spring Festival known as Chunyun, the main travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: ألغت الحكومات الوطنية والإقليمية عددًا من الفاعليات التي تضم حشودًا كبيرة، بما فيها احتفالات رأس السنة الجديدة، مع قيام الشركات الخاصة أيضًا بإغلاق متاجرها بشكل مستقل ومناطق الجذب السياحي مثل ديزني لاند هونغ كونغ وديزني لاند شانغهاي.
en-mt: National and regional governments have cancelled a number of large-crowd events, including New Year's Eve celebrations, with private companies also independently closing their stores and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: أُغلقت العديد من فعاليات السنة القمرية الجديدة ومناطق الجذب السياحي لمنع التجمعات الكبيرة، بما فيها المدينة المحرمة في بكين ومعارض المعابد التقليدية.
en-mt: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent large gatherings, including Beijing's Forbidden City and traditional temple fairs.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: في 24 مقاطعة من المقاطعات الـ 31، وفي بلديات ومناطق في الصين، مددت السلطات عطلة رأس السنة الجديدة حتى 10 فبراير، وأصدرت تعليمات لمعظم أماكن العمل بعدم إعادة الفتح حتى ذلك التاريخ.
en-mt: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, and in municipalities and regions in China, authorities extended the New Year's holiday until February 10, instructing most workplaces not to reopen until that date.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: تمثل هذه المناطق 80% من إجمالي الناتج المحلي للبلاد و90% من الصادرات.
en-mt: These regions account for 80 percent of the country's GDP and 90 percent of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: رفعت هونغ كونغ مستوى الاستجابة للأمراض المعدية إلى أعلى مستوى وأعلنت حالة الطوارئ، وأغلقت المدارس حتى مارس وألغت احتفالات العام الجديد. تأثر قطاع التجزئة على مستوى العالم بتخفيض ساعات العمل في المتاجر أو الإغلاق المؤقت.
en-mt: Hong Kong raised the level of infectious disease response to the highest level and declared a state of emergency, closing schools until March and canceling New Year's celebrations. The retail sector globally has been affected by reduced store hours or temporary closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: انخفضت الزيارات إلى تجار التجزئة في أوروبا وأمريكا اللاتينية بـ 40%.
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America fell by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: شهد تجار التجزئة في أمريكا الشمالية والشرق الأوسط انخفاضًا بين 50 و60%.
en-mt: Retailers in North America and the Middle East saw a decline of between 50 and 60%.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: أدى ذلك أيضًا إلى انخفاض بين 33 و43% في حركة مرور المشاة إلى مراكز التسوق في شهر مارس مقارنة بشهر فبراير.
en-mt: This also led to a 33-43% drop in pedestrian traffic to shopping malls in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: فرض مشغلو مراكز التسوق حول العالم تدابير إضافية، مثل زيادة النظافة، وتركيب ماسحات ضوئية حرارية للتحقق من درجة حرارة المتسوقين، وإلغاء الفاعليات. ووفقًا لتقديرات اللجنة الاقتصادية للأمم المتحدة لأمريكا اللاتينية، يمكن أن يترك الركود الناجم عن الجائحة ما بين 14 و22 مليون شخص في فقر مدقع في أمريكا اللاتينية أكثر ممن كانوا سيعانون هذا الوضع دون الجائحة.
en-mt: Mall operators around the world have imposed additional measures, such as increased hygiene, the installation of thermal scanners to check shoppers' temperature, and the cancellation of events. The United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America (UNECLA) estimates that the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have suffered without the pandemic.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: في يناير وفبراير 2020، خلال ذروة الوباء في ووهان، فقد حوالي 5 ملايين شخص في الصين وظائفهم.
en-mt: In January and February 2020, during the peak of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: حوصر العديد من العمال المهاجرين الريفيين الصينيين البالغ عددهم حوالي 300 مليون في منازلهم في المقاطعات الداخلية، أو في مقاطعة هوبي. وفي مارس 2020، فقد أكثر من 10 ملايين أمريكي وظائفهم وتقدموا بطلب للحصول على المساعدة الحكومية.
en-mt: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been trapped in their homes in inland provinces, or in Hubei province. In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: قد يكلف تفشي فيروس كورونا فقدان 47 مليون وظيفة في الولايات المتحدة، وقد يصل معدل البطالة إلى 32%، وفقًا لتقديرات البنك الاحتياطي الفيدرالي في سانت لويس. وقد خلّف الإغلاق في الهند عشرات الملايين من العمال المهاجرين الهنود (الذين يحصلون على رواتب من خلال الأجور اليومية) العاطلين عن العمل. وجدت الدراسة الاستقصائية التي أجراها معهد أنجوس ريد أن 44% من الأسر الكندية عانت نوعًا من البطالة. فقد ما يقرب من 900,000 عامل وظائفهم في إسبانيا منذ إغلاقها في منتصف مارس 2020.
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs lost in the United States, and the unemployment rate could reach 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis. The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who earn salaries through daily wages) unemployed. A survey by the Angus Reed Institute found that 44% of Canadian households experienced some form of unemployment. Nearly 900,000 workers have lost their jobs in Spain since its closure in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: خلال النصف الثاني من شهر مارس، تقدم 4 ملايين عامل فرنسي بطلب للحصول على إعانات البطالة المؤقتة و1 مليون عامل بريطاني تقدموا بطلب للحصول على مخطط ائتمان شامل. وأرسلت ما يقرب من نصف مليون شركة في ألمانيا عمالها في خطط عمل قصيرة المدة مدعومة من الحكومة تُعرف بكورزاربيت.
en-mt: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme. Nearly half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers into government-backed short-term business plans known as Kurzarbet.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: تبنت فرنسا وبريطانيا خطة تعويض العمل لفترات قصيرة الألمانية.
en-mt: France and Britain adopted the German short-term work compensation scheme.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: تأثر قطاعا الفنون المسرحية والتراث الثقافي تأثرًا عميقًا بالجائحة، مما أثر على عمليات المنظمات وكذلك الأفراد—العاملين والمستقلين—عالميًا.
en-mt: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly impacted by the pandemic, impacting the operations of organizations as well as individuals – working and freelancers – globally.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: سعت مؤسسات قطاع الفنون والثقافة إلى دعم مهمتها (الممولة من الحكومة غالبًا) لتوفير الوصول إلى التراث الثقافي للمجتمع، والحفاظ على سلامة موظفيها والجمهور، ودعم الفنانين قدر الإمكان.
en-mt: Arts and culture sector organizations have sought to support their mission (often government-funded) to provide access to the cultural heritage of the community, keep their staff and the public safe, and support artists as much as possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: بحلول مارس 2020، في جميع أنحاء العالم وبدرجات متفاوتة، أُغلقت المتاحف، والمكتبات، وأماكن تقديم العروض، وغيرها من المؤسسات الثقافية إلى أجل غير مسمى مع إلغاء معارضها وفعالياتها وعروضها أو تأجيلها.
en-mt: By March 2020, worldwide and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions were closed indefinitely with their exhibitions, events, and performances cancelled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: استجابةً لذلك كانت هناك جهود مكثفة لتقديم خدمات بديلة من خلال المنصات الرقمية. ومن بين التداعيات الحديثة الأخرى المتسارعة للمرض تم إلغاء الخدمات الدينية، والفعاليات الرئيسة الرياضية، وغيرها من الفعاليات الاجتماعية، مثل المهرجانات الموسيقية والحفلات الموسيقية، والمؤتمرات التكنولوجية، وعروض الأزياء.
en-mt: In response, there have been intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms. Among other accelerating recent repercussions of the disease have been the cancellation of religious services, major sporting events, and other social events, such as music festivals, concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: عانت صناعة السينما أيضًا توقفًا. وأعلن الفاتيكان إلغاء احتفالات الأسبوع المقدس في روما، التي تحدث خلال الأسبوع الأخير من موسم التوبة المسيحي في الصوم الكبير.
en-mt: The film industry also suffered a halt to it. The Vatican announced the cancellation of Rome's Holy Week celebrations, which occur during the last week of the Christian season of Penance in Lent.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: أوصت العديد من الأبرشيات المسيحيين كبار السن بالبقاء في المنزل عوضًا عن حضور القداس أيام الأحد؛ حيث جعلت بعض الكنائس خدمات الكنيسة متاحة عبر الإذاعة، أو البث المباشر عبر الإنترنت أو التلفزيون بينما يقدم البعض الآخر العبادة دون مغادرة سياراتهم.
en-mt: Many parishes have recommended that older Christians stay at home rather than attend mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, live streaming over the Internet or television, while others offer worship without leaving their cars.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: مع إغلاق أبرشية روما الكاثوليكية في روما كنائسها والمصلى الكنسي، وإخلاء ساحة القديس بطرس من الحجاج المسيحيين، ألغت الهيئات الدينية الأخرى أيضًا الخدمات والتجمعات العامة المحدودة في الكنائس، والمساجد، ومعابد الكنيس اليهودية، والمعابد، والغوردوارا.
en-mt: With the Catholic Archdiocese of Rome in Rome closing its churches and chapel, and St. Peter's Square being cleared of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also canceled limited public services and gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, synagogues, synagogues, and gurdwara.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: أعلنت وزارة الصحة الإيرانية عن إلغاء صلاة الجمعة في المناطق المتضررة من التفشي وبعد ذلك أغلقت الأضرحة، في حين حظرت المملكة العربية السعودية دخول الحجاج الأجانب وكذلك سكانها إلى الأماكن المقدسة في مكة والمدينة.
en-mt: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and subsequently closed shrines, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to the holy sites of Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: سببت هذه الجائحة أكبر اختلال في التقويم الرياضي العالمي منذ الحرب العالمية الثانية.
en-mt: The pandemic has caused the biggest disruption of the global sports calendar since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: أُلغيت معظم الفعاليات الرياضية الكبرى أو أُجلت، بما فيها دوري أبطال أوروبا 2019-20، والدوري الممتاز 2019-20، والدوري الأوروبي 2020، وموسم الدوري الأمريكي لكرة السلة للمحترفين 2019-20، وموسم دوري الهوكي الوطني 2019-20.
en-mt: Most major sporting events have been canceled or postponed, including the 2019-20 Champions League, the 2019-20 Premier League, the 2020 Europa League, the 2019-20 NBA season, and the 2019-20 National Hockey League season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: عطّل التفشي خطط دورة الألعاب الأولمبية الصيفية لعام 2020، والتي كان من المقرر أن تبدأ في نهاية شهر يوليو، وأعلنت اللجنة الأولمبية الدولية في 24 مارس أن الفاعلية "ستعاد جدولتها إلى ما بعد عام 2020 ولكن في موعد أقصاه صيف 2021". أغلقت نوادي القمار وأماكن اللعب الأخرى حول العالم وأُجلت بطولات القمار المباشرة أو أُلغيت.
en-mt: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were scheduled to begin at the end of July, and the IOC announced on March 24 that the event "will be rescheduled beyond 2020 but no later than summer 2021." Gambling clubs and other playing venues around the world have closed and live gambling tournaments have been postponed or cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: أدى هذا بالعديد من المقامرين إلى الانتقال للعب عبر الإنترنت، حيث أبلغت العديد من مواقع المقامرة عبر الإنترنت عن زيادات كبيرة في معدلات الاشتراكات الجديدة. تأثرت صناعة الترفيه أيضًا، حيث علّقت مجموعات موسيقية مختلفة أو ألغت جولات الحفلات الموسيقية.
en-mt: This led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in new subscription rates. The entertainment industry was also affected, with various music groups suspending or concert tours canceled.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: علقت العديد من المسارح الكبيرة مثل تلك الموجودة في برودواي جميع العروض أيضًا.
en-mt: Many large theaters like the one on Broadway have suspended all performances as well.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: اكتشف بعض الفنانين طرقًا لمواصلة إنتاج العمل ومشاركته عبر الإنترنت كبديل للأداء المباشر التقليدي، مثل حفلات البث المباشر أو إنشاء "احتفالات" عبر الإنترنت للفنانين لأداء أعمالهم وتوزيعها ونشرها.
en-mt: Some artists have discovered ways to continue producing and sharing work online as an alternative to traditional live performances, such as live concerts or creating online "celebrations" for artists to perform, distribute, and publish their work.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: انتشرت على شبكة الإنترنت العديد من ميمات الإنترنت عن فيروس كورونا حيث تحول الكثير إلى الفكاهة والتسلية في ظل عدم اليقين.
en-mt: Many internet memes about the coronavirus have spread on the Internet, with many turning to humor and entertainment in light of uncertainty.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: منذ تفشي كوفيد-19، لوحظ التحيز الشديد وكراهية الأجانب وعنصريتهم تجاه الأشخاص ذوي الأصول الصينية والشرق آسيوية، وضد الأشخاص من البؤر الساخنة في أوروبا والولايات المتحدة وبلدان أخرى.
en-mt: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, extreme prejudice, xenophobia and racism towards people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries have been observed.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: لوحظت حوادث الخوف والشك والعداء في العديد من البلدان، وخاصة في أوروبا، وشرق آسيا، وأمريكا الشمالية، ومنطقة آسيا والمحيط الهادئ.
en-mt: Incidents of fear, suspicion and hostility have been observed in many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: وثقت التقارير الصادرة في فبراير (عندما كانت غالبية الحالات لا تزال محصورة في الصين) مشاعر عنصرية عبرت عنها مجموعات مختلفة في جميع أنحاء العالم تجاه الصينيين بأنهم يستحقون الفيروس أو يتلقون ما يُزعم أنه عقاب مبرر.
en-mt: Reports in February (when the majority of cases were still confined to China) documented racist sentiments expressed by various groups around the world towards the Chinese that they deserved the virus or were allegedly receiving justified punishment.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: شهدت المشاعر المعادية للصين أيضًا ارتفاعًا في بعض الدول الإفريقية.
en-mt: Anti-China sentiment has also seen a rise in some African countries.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: أبلغ العديد من سكان ووهان وهوبي عن تمييز بسبب أصلهم الإقليمي.
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei reported discrimination because of their territorial origin.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: كان هناك دعم للصينيين سواء على شبكة الإنترنت أو خارجها، ولأولئك الذين يعيشون في المناطق المتضررة من الفيروس.
en-mt: There has been support for the Chinese both online and offline, and for those living in areas affected by the virus.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: بعد انتشار التفشي في بؤر ساخنة جديدة، قد يتعرض الأشخاص من إيطاليا، وهي أول دولة في أوروبا تشهد تفشيًا شديدًا لكوفيد-19، لتشكك وكراهية الأجانب. وقَّع المواطنون في دول بما فيها ماليزيا، ونيوزيلندا، وسنغافورة، وكوريا الجنوبية في البداية على عرائض للضغط لمنع الصينيين من دخول بلادهم في جهد لوقف المرض.
en-mt: After the outbreak spreads to new hotspots, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a severe COVID-19 outbreak, may experience xenophobic skepticism. Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea initially signed petitions to lobby to prevent Chinese from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: في اليابان، تصدر هاشتاج ChineseDontComeToJapan# تويتر.
en-mt: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan topped Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: أبلغ الصينيون وكذلك غيرهم من الآسيويين في المملكة المتحدة والولايات المتحدة عن تزايد مستويات الانتهاكات العنصرية، وكذلك الاعتداءات.
en-mt: Chinese as well as other Asians in the UK and the US reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: واجه الرئيس الأمريكي دونالد ترامب انتقادات إزاء الإشارة إلى فيروس كورونا على أنه "فيروس صيني"، وهو مصطلح اعتبره النقاد عنصريًا ومعاديًا للصينيين.
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has faced criticism over referring to the coronavirus as a "Chinese virus", a term critics have deemed racist and anti-Chinese.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: هاجم المتظاهرون في أوكرانيا حافلات تقل أوكرانيين وأجانب يتم إجلاؤهم من ووهان إلى نوفي سانزاري.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying evacuated Ukrainians and foreigners from Wuhan to Novi Sanzary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: واجه الطلاب القادمون من شمال شرق الهند، التي تشترك في الحدود مع الصين، والذين يدرسون في المدن الهندية الكبرى، مضايقات بسبب تفشي فيروس كورونا.
en-mt: Students from northeastern India, which shares a border with China, and studying in major Indian cities, have faced harassment due to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: صرح رئيس وحدة حزب بهاراتيا جاناتا في ولاية البنغال الغربية ديليب غوش أن الصينيين دمروا الطبيعة و"لهذا السبب انتقم الرب منهم".
en-mt: The head of the BJP unit in West Bengal, Dilip Ghosh, said the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the Lord avenged them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: وأدانت القنصلية الصينية في كولكاتا هذه التصريحات في وقت لاحق، واصفة إياها بأنها "خاطئة". وفي الصين، أدت الجائحة إلى تزايد كره الأجانب وممارسة العنصرية ضد المقيمين غير الصينيين، حيث وُصف الأجانب بأنهم "قمامة أجنبية" واُستهدفوا "للتخلص منهم".
en-mt: The Chinese consulate in Kolkata later condemned the remarks, calling them "false". In China, the pandemic has led to an increase in xenophobia and racism against non-Chinese residents, with foreigners being labelled as "foreign garbage" and targeted to "get rid of them".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: أزالت العديد من الصحف صفحات مدفوعة الاشتراك لبعض تغطيتها لفيروس كورونا أو جميعها.
en-mt: Many newspapers have removed paid subscription pages for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: أتاح العديد من الناشرين العلميين الأوراق العلمية المتعلقة بالتفشي للوصول المفتوح.
en-mt: Many scientific publishers have made scientific papers related to the outbreak available for open access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: اختار بعض العلماء مشاركة نتائجهم بسرعة على خوادم ما قبل الطباعة مثل bioRxiv.
en-mt: Some scientists have chosen to quickly share their results on prepress servers like bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: غالبًا ما تكون الأمراض المعدية الناشئة – الأمراض المعدية من مسببات الأمراض الناشئة، مستجدة من حيث نطاق تفشيها أو طريقة انتقالها
en-mt: Emerging infectious diseases – infectious diseases are often emerging pathogens, emerging in terms of the scope of their outbreak or mode of transmission

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: العولمة والمرض – نظرة عامة بشأن العولمة وانتقال الأمراض
en-mt: Globalization and disease – an overview of globalization and disease transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: قائمة الأوبئة والجوائح – قائمة حصيلة الوفيات بسبب الأمراض المعدية
en-mt: List of epidemics and pandemics – List of death toll from infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: تهريب الحيوانات البرية والأمراض الحيوانية المنشأ – المخاطر الصحية المرتبطة بالتجارة في الحيوانات البرية الغريبة
en-mt: Smuggling of wild animals and zoonotic diseases – health risks associated with trade in exotic wildlife

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: يتضمن الاختبار المعملي لمرض فيروس كورونا التنفسي 2019 (كوفيد-19) وفيروس سارس-كوف-2 المرتبط به طرقًا للكشف عن وجود الفيروس حيث تتعرف على الأجسام المضادة التي تنتج استجابة للعدوى.
en-mt: Laboratory testing for respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes ways to detect the presence of the virus as they recognize antibodies produced in response to infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: يؤكِّد آر تي-بي سي آر وجود فيروسات في العينات، حيث يكتشف الحمض النووي الريبوزي لفيروس كورونا.
en-mt: RT-PCR confirms the presence of viruses in the samples, as it detects the RNA of the coronavirus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: هذا الاختبار دقيق ومُصمَّم فقط للكشف عن الحمض النووي الريبوزي لفيروس سارس-كوف-2.
en-mt: This test is accurate and designed only to detect SARS-CoV-2 RNA.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: يُستخدَم لتأكيد حالات الإصابة الحديثة جدًا أو النشطة.
en-mt: Used to confirm cases of very recent or active infection.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: يُستَخدَم الكشف عن الأجسام المضادة (علم الأمصال) للتشخيص ومراقبة السكان.
en-mt: Antibody detection (serology) is used for diagnosis and monitoring of populations.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: تُظهر اختبارات الأجسام المضادة عدد الأشخاص الذين أصيبوا بالمرض، بما في ذلك مَن كانت أعراض مرضهم بسيطة لدرجة لا تدعو للإبلاغ عنها أو مَن لم تظهر عليهم أعراض.
en-mt: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too mild to report or who didn't have symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: يمكن تحديد معدل الوفيات الدقيق للمرض ومستوى المناعة الجماعية بين السكان اعتمادًا على نتائج هذا الاختبار.
en-mt: The exact mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined depending on the results of this test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: نظرًا لمحدودية الاختبارات، لم تكن لدى أي دولة في مارس 2020 بيانات موثوقة حول انتشار الفيروس بين سكانها.
en-mt: Due to limited testing, no country in March 2020 had reliable data on the spread of the virus among its population.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: في 23 مارس، لم تفحص أي دولة أكثر من 3٪ من سكانها، وهناك تبايُن كبير في عدد الاختبارات التي أجرتها مختلف البلدان.
en-mt: On March 23, no country screened more than 3% of its population, and there is a wide variation in the number of tests carried out by different countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: يُرجَّح كذلك أن يؤثر هذا التباين بشكل كبير في معدلات وفيات الحالات المُبلغ عنها، والتي يُحتَمل أن يُبالَغ في تقديرها بشكل كبير في بعض البلدان.
en-mt: This discrepancy is also likely to significantly affect the mortality rates of reported cases, which are likely to be significantly overestimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: يمكن باستخدام تفاعل البوليمراز المتسلسل اللحظي للنسخ العكسي (آر آر تي-بي سي آر) إجراء الفحص على عينات الجهاز التنفسي التي يتم الحصول عليها بطرق مختلفة، منها المسحة البلعومية الأنفية أو عينة البلغم.
en-mt: Using instantaneous reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RRT-PCR), the test can be performed on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: تتوفر النتائج بشكل عام في غضون بضع ساعات إلى 2 من الأيام.
en-mt: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: لا يُعتمد على آر تي-بي سي آر الذي يُجرى باستخدام مسحات الحلق إلا في الأسبوع الأول من المرض.
en-mt: RT-PCR is only used with throat swabs in the first week of illness.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: قد يختفي الفيروس من الحلق بعد ذلك بينما يستمر في التكاثر في الرئتين.
en-mt: The virus may then disappear from the throat as it continues to multiply in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: بالنسبة للأشخاص المصابين الذين يخضعون للفحص في الأسبوع الثاني، يمكن بدلاً من ذلك أخذ عينة من المجاري الهوائية العميقة عن طريق قسطرة الشفط أو استخدام مادة السعال (البلغم).
en-mt: For infected people who are screened in the second week, a deep airway sample can instead be taken through a suction catheter or cough material (sputum).

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: ابتُكر أحد اختبارات بي سي آر المبكرة في الشاريتيه في برلين في يناير 2020 باستخدام تفاعل البوليمراز المتسلسل اللحظي للنسخ العكسي (آر آر تي-بي سي آر)، وشكَّل الأساس لـ 250,000 طقم اختبار توزعه منظمة الصحة العالمية (منظمة الصحة العالمية).
en-mt: An early PCR test was created at the Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using instantaneous reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RRT-PCR), and formed the basis for 250,000 test kits distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: طوَّرت المملكة المتحدة أيضًا اختبارًا في 23 يناير 2020.كما ابتكرت الشركة الكورية الجنوبية Kogenebiotech طقم كشف (PowerChek Coronavirus) لفيروس سارس-كوف-2 مناسبًا للاستخدام السريري الآمن ويعتمد على بي سي آر في 28 يناير 2020.
en-mt: The UK also developed a test on January 23, 2020.South Korean company Kogenebiotech also created a PowerChek Coronavirus detection kit for SARS-CoV-2 suitable for safe clinical use and based on PCR on January 28, 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: تبحث عن الجين "E" الذي تشترك فيه جميع فيروسات كورونا بيتا والجين RdRp الخاص بسارس-كوف-2.وفي الصين، كانت BGI Group من أولى الشركات التي حصلت على موافقة استخدام في الطوارئ من الإدارة الوطنية الصينية للمنتجات الطبية لطقم كشف عن سارس-كوف-2 يعتمد على بي سي آر.وفي الولايات المتحدة، توزِّع مراكز مكافحة الأمراض والوقاية منها (سي دي سي) لوحة تشخيص لفيروس كورونا المستجد-2019 (فيروس كورونا المستجد-2019 ) خاصة به تعتمد على آر تي-بي سي آر اللحظي على مختبرات الصحة العامة من خلال هيئة توفير المواد الكاشفة الدولية.
en-mt: In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from the China National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its own 2019-based novel coronavirus (novel coronavirus-2019) diagnostic panel based on instantaneous RT-PCR to health laboratories. Public through the International Reagents Supply Authority.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: نتجت عن أحد الاختبارات الجينية الثلاثة في الإصدارات القديمة من أطقم الاختبار نتائج غير حاسمة بسبب المواد الكاشفة المعيبة، وتأخُّر إحدى مراحل الاختبار عن غيرها في سي دي سي في أتلانتا؛ وقد أدى ذلك إلى إتمام اختبار أقل من 100 عينة يوميًا في المتوسط بنجاح طوال شهر فبراير 2020 بالكامل.
en-mt: One of the three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits yielded inconclusive results due to defective reagents, and one phase of testing was delayed from the other at CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in the successful completion of testing of fewer than 100 samples per day on average throughout the entire month of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: لم تحظَ الاختبارات التي تستخدم مكونين بالثقة حتى 28 فبراير 2020، ولم يكن حتى ذلك الحين مسموحًا للمختبرات الحكومية والمحلية ببدء إجراء الاختبارات.
en-mt: Tests using two components were not trusted until February 28, 2020, and until then state and local laboratories were not allowed to start testing.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: وافقت إدارة الغذاء والدواء على الاختبار بموجب إذن الاستخدام في الطوارئ. بدأت المختبرات التجارية في الولايات المتحدة إجراء الاختبارات في أوائل مارس 2020.
en-mt: The FDA approved the test under emergency use authorization. Commercial laboratories in the United States began conducting tests in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: في 5 مارس 2020، أعلنت لاب كورب عن توفُّر اختبار كوفيد-19 في جميع أنحاء البلاد اعتمادًا على آر تي-بي سي آر.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, Lab Corp announced the availability of COVID-19 testing across the country based on RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: وبالمثل، أتاحت كويست دياجنوستكس اختبار كوفيد-19 في جميع أنحاء البلاد اعتبارًا من 9 مارس 2020.
en-mt: Similarly, Quest Diagnostics made COVID-19 testing available across the country as of March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: لم يُعلَن عن أي قيود كمية؛ يجب إجراء عملية سحب العينات ومعالجتها وفقًا لمتطلبات سي دي سي.
en-mt: No quantitative restrictions have been declared; sampling must be conducted and processed in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: في روسيا، ابتكر مركز الدولة لأبحاث علم الفيروسات والتكنولوجيا الحيوية فيكتور اختبار كوفيد-19 وأنتجه.
en-mt: In Russia, the State Research Center for Virology and Biotechnology Victor created and produced the COVID-19 test.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: في 11 فبراير 2020، سجَّلت هيئة الخدمة الفيدرالية لمراقبة الرعاية الصحية الاختبار. وفي 12 مارس 2020، أُفيد بأن مايو كلينيك طورت اختبارًا للكشف عن عدوى كوفيد-19. وفي 13 مارس 2020، حصلت روش دياجنوستكس على موافقة إدارة الغذاء والدواء على اختبار يمكن إجراؤه في غضون 3.5 ساعات على أعداد كبيرة، مما يسمح لآلة واحدة بإجراء ما يقرُب من 4128 اختبارًا على مدى 24 ساعة.
en-mt: On February 11, 2020, the Federal Service for Health Care Surveillance registered the test. On March 12, 2020, it was reported that Mayo Clinic had developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test that can be performed within 3.5 hours on large numbers, allowing a single machine to perform approximately 4,128 tests over a 24-hour period.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: في 19 مارس 2020، منحت إدارة الغذاء والدواء إذن الاستخدام في الطوارئ (إي يو إيه) لمختبرات أبوت لإجراء اختبار على نظام أبوت m2000؛ وقد منحت إدارة الغذاء والدواء سابقًا تصريحًا مشابهًا لهولوجيك ولاب كورب وثيرمو فيشر ساينتيفيك.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories to conduct testing on the Abbott M2000 system; the FDA had previously granted similar authorization to Holocic, Labcorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: في 21 مارس 2020، حصلت سيفيد على إذن استخدام في الطوارئ مشابه من إدارة الغذاء والدواء لصالح اختبار يستغرق حوالي 45 دقيقة.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Sefied received similar emergency use authorization from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: وافقت إدارة الغذاء والدواء على اختبار يستخدم تقنية تضخيم الحمض النووي المتساوي الحرارة بدلاً من بي سي آر.
en-mt: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a test that uses isothermal DNA amplification technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: نظرًا لأن هذا لا يتطلب سلسلة من دورات درجة الحرارة المتعاقبة، يمكن أن تُظهر هذه الطريقة النتائج الإيجابية في أقل من خمس دقائق والنتائج السلبية في 13 دقيقة.
en-mt: Since this does not require a series of successive temperature cycles, this method can show positive results in less than five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: يوجد حاليًا حوالي 18,000 من هذه الآلات في الولايات المتحدة وتتوقع أبوت زيادة التصنيع لإجراء 50,000 اختبار في اليوم. كما تُطوِّر تايوان اختبارًا يستخدم جسمًا مضادًا وحيد النسيلة يرتبط بشكل خاص ببروتين القفيصة النووية (بروتين إن) لفيروس كورونا المستجد، على أمل أن يتمكن من تحقيق نتائج في غضون 15 إلى 20 دقيقة مثل اختبار الإنفلونزا السريع.
en-mt: There are currently about 18,000 such machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to increase manufacturing to perform 50,000 tests a day. Taiwan is also developing a test that uses a monoclonal antibody that binds specifically to the nuclear capsid protein (N-protein) of the novel coronavirus, hoping it can produce results within 15 to 20 minutes like a rapid flu test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: خلُص استعراض لدراسات في مارس 2020 إلى أن "الصور الشعاعية للصدر ذات قيمة تشخيصية ضئيلة في المراحل المبكرة، في حين أن نتائج سي تي [التصوير المقطعي المحوسب] قد تكون واضحة حتى قبل ظهور الأعراض".
en-mt: A review of studies in March 2020 concluded that "chest radiographs have little diagnostic value in the early stages, while CT [CT] results may be clear even before symptoms appear."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: تشتمل الخصائص المعتادة التي تظهر في التصوير المقطعي المحوسب على عتامات الزجاج المُصنفر ثنائية الجانب المتعددة الفصوص مع توزيع محيطي وغير متماثل وخلفي.
en-mt: Typical characteristics seen in CT include double-lobed frosted glass opacities with circumferential, asymmetrical, and posterior distribution.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: يتطور انتشار تحت الجنبة وتظهر رقع غير منتظمة وتكثف مع تطوُّر المرض.
en-mt: Subpleural spread develops, irregular patches appear and intensify as the disease progresses.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: أشارت دراسة في مدينة ووهان تقارن بين بي سي آر والتصوير المقطعي المحوسب فيما يتعلق بمنشأ الجائحة الحالية إلى أن التصوير المقطعي المحوسب أكثر حساسية من بي سي آر، رغم أنه أقل دقة، مع تداخُل العديد من خصائصه التصويرية مع حالات التهاب رئوي ومراحل مرضية أخرى.
en-mt: A study in Wuhan comparing PCR and CT scans regarding the origin of the current pandemic indicated that CT scans are more sensitive than PCR, although less accurate, with many of its imaging characteristics intertwined with pneumonia and other stages of illness.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: في مارس 2020، توصي الكلية الأمريكية للتصوير الشعاعي "بعدم استخدام التصوير المقطعي المحوسب للكشف عن كوفيد-19 أو اعتباره فحصًا أوليًا لتشخيص المرض". وفي مارس 2020، يوصي سي دي سي باستخدام بي سي آر للفحص الأولي.
en-mt: In March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "computerized tomography not be used to detect COVID-19 or be considered a preliminary examination to diagnose the disease." In March 2020, CDC recommends using PCR for initial screening.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: ينطوي جزء من الاستجابة المناعية للعدوى على إنتاج الأجسام المضادة، بما في ذلك IgM وIgG.
en-mt: Part of the immune response to infection involves the production of antibodies, including IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: يمكن استخدامها للكشف عن إصابة الأفراد خلال فترة تبدأ من 7 أيام أو بعد ظهور الأعراض، لتحديد قدرة المناعة، وفي حالة المراقبة السكانية. يمكن إجراء التحاليل في المختبرات المركزية (سي إل تي) أو عن طريق اختبار نقطة الرعاية السريرية (بي أو سي تي).
en-mt: They can be used to detect infection of individuals within a period starting from 7 days or after the onset of symptoms, to determine the ability of immunity, and in the case of population surveillance. Analyzes can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by clinical point of care (POCT) testing.

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: ستتمكن الأنظمة الآلية فائقة الأداء في الكثير من المختبرات السريرية من إجراء هذه التحاليل، ولكن سيعتمد مدى توفرها على معدل الإنتاج لكل نظام.
en-mt: High-performance automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these analyses, but their availability will depend on the production rate of each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: بالنسبة للمختبرات المركزية، تُستخدَم عادةً عينة واحدة من خلايا الدم المحيطي، على الرغم من إمكانية الاستعانة بعينات متتالية لمتابعة الاستجابة المناعية.
en-mt: For central laboratories, a single sample of peripheral blood cells is usually used, although consecutive samples can be used to monitor the immune response.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: بالنسبة لاختبار نقطة الرعاية السريرية تُسحَب عادةً عينة دم واحدة عن طريق ثَقب الجلد.
en-mt: For a point-of-care clinical test, a single blood sample is usually drawn through a skin puncture.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: خلافًا لطرق بي سي آر فإنه لا يلزم إجراء خطوة الاستخلاص قُبَيل الفحص. وفي 26 مارس 2020، حددت إدارة الغذاء والدواء 29 جهةً قدمت إخطارًا للوكالة وفق الاشتراطات وعليهِ تتمكن هذه الجهات من توزيع ما لديها من اختبارات للأجسام المضادة.
en-mt: Unlike PCR methods, the extraction step does not need to be performed prior to the examination. On March 26, 2020, the FDA identified 29 entities that had notified the IAEA in accordance with the requirements and therefore were able to distribute their antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: في 7 أبريل 2020، اعتمدت إدارة الغذاء والدواء اختبارًا واحدًا فقط بموجب إذن الاستخدام في الطوارئ. وفي أواخر مارس 2020، حصلت شركتا Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics وEpitope Diagnostics على الاعتمادات الأوروبية لصالح أطقم الاختبار الخاصة بهما، والتي بإمكانها الكشف عن الأجسام المضادة للفيروس IgG وIgA في عينات الدم.
en-mt: On April 7, 2020, the FDA approved only one test under the Emergency Use Authorization. In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European accreditations for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: يُنجِز الاختبار عدة مئات من العينات في غضون ساعات ومن ثم فهو أسرع بكثير من تحليل بي سي آر التقليدي للحمض النووي الريبوزي الفيروسي.
en-mt: The test completes several hundred samples in a matter of hours and is therefore much faster than traditional PCR analysis of viral RNA.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: يُمكن الكشف عن الأجسام المضادة غالبًا بعد 14 يومًا من بداية العدوى. وفي مطلَع أبريل، اكتشفت المملكة المتحدة أن أطقم اختبار الأجسام المضادة التي اشترتها غير جيدة بما يكفي لاستخدامها.
en-mt: Antibodies can often be detected 14 days after the onset of infection. In early April, the UK discovered that the antibody test kits it had purchased were not good enough to use.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: وضعت هونغ كونغ خطة يمكن بموجبها للمرضى المُشتبه في إصابتهم البقاء في منازلهم، "يُعطِي قسم الطوارئ أنبوب عينة للمرضى"، يبصقون في الأنبوب، ويعيدونه مرة أخرى ليحصلوا على نتيجة الاختبار بعد فترة بسيطة. أعلنت هيئة الخدمات الصحية الوطنية البريطانية أنها تجرِّب خطة لاختبار الحالات المشتبه في إصابتها في المنزل، وبذلك يُستبعد خطر انتقال العدوى من المصابين عند مجيئهم إلى المستشفى أو الحاجة إلى تعقيم سيارة الإسعاف المستخدمة. عند إجراء اختبار كوفيد-19 للحالات المشتبه فيها دون مغادرة السيارة، يسحب اختصاصي الرعاية الصحية العينة مُتخذًا الاحتياطات المناسبة.
en-mt: Hong Kong has developed a plan under which suspected patients can stay at home, "the emergency department gives a sample tube to patients," spit into the tube, and put it back to get the test result after a short while. Britain's National Health Service (NHS) has announced that it is piloting a plan to test suspected cases at home, ruling out the risk of transmission from infected people when they come to hospital or the need to sanitize the ambulance used. When COVID-19 testing for suspected cases without leaving the vehicle, the healthcare professional recalls the sample taking appropriate precautions.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: مكَّنت مراكز إجراء الفحص داخل السيارة كوريا الجنوبية من إجراء مجموعة من أسرع الاختبارات وأكثرها شمولاً على مستوى العالم. وفي ألمانيا، أعربت الرابطة الوطنية لأطباء التأمين الصحي القانوني في 2 مارس أنها استطاعت إجراء حوالي 12,000 اختبار يوميًا للمرضى الخارجيين وخضع 10.700 شخص للاختبار في الأسبوع الماضي.
en-mt: In-car inspection centers have enabled South Korea to conduct some of the fastest and most comprehensive tests globally. In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on March 2 that it had been able to conduct about 12,000 outpatient tests a day and 10,700 people were tested last week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: يتحمل التأمين الصحي التكاليف إذا أمر طبيب بإجراء الاختبار.
en-mt: Health insurance bears the costs if a doctor orders the test.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: وفقًا لرئيس معهد روبرت كوخ، لدى ألمانيا قدرة إجمالية تصل إلى إجراء نحو 160,000 اختبار أسبوعيًا.
en-mt: According to the head of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has a total capacity of about 160,000 tests per week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: في 19 مارس أُتيحت اختبارات الكشف عن الفيروس داخل السيارة في العديد من المدن الكبرى.
en-mt: On March 19, in-car testing for the virus was made available in several major cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: في 26 مارس 2020 لم يكن إجمالي عدد الاختبارات التي أُجرِيَت في ألمانيا معروفًا، لأنه لم يُعلَن إلا عن نتائج الحالات الإيجابية.
en-mt: On March 26, 2020, the total number of tests carried out in Germany was unknown, as only positive case results were announced.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: كشفت دراسة معملية أولية أنه بدءًا من الأسبوع التقويمي 12/2020، خضعت ما لا يقل عن 483,295 عينة للاختبار حتى نهاية الأسبوع 12/2020، وكانت نتائج 33,491 عينة (6.9%) إيجابية الإصابة بفيروس سارس-كوف-2.وفي إسرائيل، ابتكر باحثون في التخنيون ومستشفى رمبام طريقة لفحص عينات مأخوذة من 64 مريضًا في الوقت نفسه وأخضعوا تلك الطريقة للاختبار، وذلك من خلال تجميع العينات وعدم إجراء المزيد من الفحوص إلا حين يتبين أن العينة المجموعة إيجابية. وفي ووهان، افتتحت BGI مختبرًا مؤقتًا للكشف في حالة الطوارئ بمساحة 2000 متر مربع باسم "Huo-Yan" (بالصينية: 火 眼 أو "Fire Eye" باللغة الإنجليزية) في 5 فبراير 2020، والذي يمكنه فحص أكثر من 10,000 عينة في اليوم.
en-mt: A preliminary laboratory study revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020, at least 483,295 samples had been tested as of the end of week 12/2020, and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at the Technion and Rambam Hospital devised and tested a method to test samples taken from 64 patients at the same time, by collecting samples and conducting further tests only when the collected sample was found to be positive. In Wuhan, BGI opened a 2,000 square meter temporary emergency detection laboratory called "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼 or "Fire Eye" in English) on February 5, 2020, which can examine more than 10,000 samples per day.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: مع إشراف وانج جيان، مؤسس BGI، على أعمال الإنشاء واستغراق 5 أيام في ذلك، أظهرت عمليات النمذجة أن الحالات في هوبي كانت سترتفع بنسبة 47٪ وستتضاعف تكاليف فرض الحجر الصحي المتصلة بذلك إذا لم تُنجَز قدرة إجراء الاختبار تلك.
en-mt: With Wang Jian, the founder of BGI, overseeing the construction work and taking 5 days to do so, modeling operations showed that cases in Hubei would have risen by 47% and the associated quarantine costs would have doubled if that testing capability had not been completed.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: قد تبع مختبر ووهان إنشاء مختبرات Huo-Yan على الفور في شنجن وتيانجين وبكين وشانغهاي وفي 12 مدينة إجمالاً في جميع أنحاء الصين.
en-mt: The Wuhan laboratory was immediately followed by the establishment of Huo-Yan laboratories in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, Shanghai and in 12 cities in total throughout China.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: بحلول 4 مارس 2020 بلغ إجمالي الإنتاجية اليومية 50,000 اختبار يوميًّا. أصدرت Origami Assays تصميمات مفتوحة المصدر ومتعددة الإرسال يمكنها اختبار ما يصل إلى 1122 عينة لمريض للكشف عن كوفيد-19 باستخدام 93 فحصًا فقط. يمكن الاستعانة بهذه التصميمات المتوازنة في المختبرات الصغيرة دون الحاجة إلى مُعالِجات السوائل الآلية.
en-mt: By March 4, 2020, the total daily productivity was 50,000 tests per day. Origami Assays has released open-source, multicast designs that can test up to 1,122 patient samples for COVID-19 using just 93 tests. These balanced designs can be used in small laboratories without the need for automated fluid treatments.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: في مارس، تسبب نقص المواد الكاشفة وعدم كفايتها في مأزق عند إجراء عدد كبير من الاختبارات في الاتحاد الأوروبي والمملكة المتحدة والولايات المتحدة.
en-mt: In March, the shortage and inadequacy of reagents caused a dilemma when a large number of tests were carried out in the EU, UK and US.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: دفع هذا بعض المتخصصين إلى استكشاف بروتوكولات تحضير عينات تتضمن تسخين العينات عند 98 درجة مئوية (208 درجة فهرنهايت) لمدة 5 دقائق لتحرير جينوم الحمض النووي الريبوزي لإجراء المزيد من الاختبارات. وفي 31 مارس أُعلِن أن الإمارات العربية المتحدة تتربع على قمة دول العالم من حيث نسبة إجراء اختبار فيروس كورونا لسكانها، وهي في طريقها لرفع مستوى إجراء الاختبار ليصل إلى معظم السكان.
en-mt: This prompted some specialists to explore sample preparation protocols involving heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to edit the RNA genome for further testing. On March 31, it was announced that the UAE is at the top of the world in terms of the percentage of coronavirus testing for its population, and is on track to raise the level of testing to reach most of the population.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: كان ذلك من خلال مزيج من تفعيل قدرة الاختبار داخل السيارة، وشراء مختبر فائق الإنتاجية ذي نطاق يناسب السكان من Group 42 وBGI (اعتمادًا على مختبرات الكشف في حالة الطوارئ الخاصة بهما "Huo-Yan" في الصين).
en-mt: This was through a combination of activating in-car testing capability, and purchasing an ultra-productive laboratory with a population-friendly range from Group 42 and BGI (based on their Huo-Yan emergency detection laboratories in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: أُنشِئ المختبر في غضون 14 يومًا، حيث يسمح بإجراء عشرات الآلآف من اختبارات آر تي-بي سي آر يوميًا وهو أول مختبر في العالم بهذا الحجم يعمل خارج الصين.
en-mt: Established in 14 days, the lab allows tens of thousands of RT-PCR tests to be performed daily and is the first laboratory in the world of this size to operate outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: ابتُكرت طرق مختلفة للاختبار تستهدف أجزاء مختلفة من السمات الوراثية لفيروس كورونا في الصين وفرنسا وألمانيا وهونغ كونغ واليابان والولايات المتحدة.
en-mt: Different methods of testing targeting different parts of the genetic traits of the coronavirus have been devised in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: تبنَّت منظمة الصحة العالمية الخطة الألمانية لصناعة الأطقم التي تُرسل إلى البلدان المنخفضة الدخل والتي لا تمتلك الموارد لابتكار أطقمها الخاصة.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has adopted the German plan to make kits that are sent to low-income countries that do not have the resources to create their own kits.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: أُعلنت الخطة الألمانية في 17 يناير 2020؛ لم يكن البروتوكول الذي وضعته مراكز مكافحة الأمراض والوقاية منها في الولايات المتحدة متاحًا حتى 28 يناير، مما أدى إلى تأخير الاختبارات المتاحة في الولايات المتحدة. وقد واجهت الصين والولايات المتحدة مشكلات تتعلق بمدى موثوقية أطقم الاختبار في وقت مبكر من التفشي، ولم يتمكن هذان البلدان وأستراليا من توفير أطقم كافية لتلبية الطلب واتباع توصيات إجراء الاختبارات التي قدمها خبراء الصحة.
en-mt: The German plan was announced on January 17, 2020; the protocol developed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention in the United States was not available until January 28, delaying the tests available in the United States. China and the United States faced issues with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to provide enough kits to meet demand and follow testing recommendations made by health experts.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: في مقابل ذلك، صرَّح الخبراء بأن وفرة الاختبارات في كوريا الجنوبية ساعدت في الحد من انتشار فيروس كورونا المستجد.
en-mt: In contrast, experts said that the abundance of tests in South Korea has helped limit the spread of the novel coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: عززت الحكومة الكورية الجنوبية القدرة الاختبارية إلى حد كبير في مختبرات القطاع الخاص على مدى سنوات عدة.
en-mt: The South Korean government has greatly boosted testing capacity in private sector laboratories over several years.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: في 16 مارس، دعت منظمة الصحة العالمية إلى تكثيف برامج الاختبار باعتبارها الحل الأمثل للحد من تقدم جائحة كوفيد-19.تسببت زيادة الطلب على الاختبار نتيجة للانتشار الواسع للفيروس إلى تراكم مئات الآلاف من الاختبارات في المعامل الأمريكية الخاصة، كما شحت إمدادات المسحات والمواد الكاشفة الكيميائية.
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization (WHO) called for intensifying testing programs as the best solution to limit the progression of the COVID-19 pandemic.Increased demand for testing as a result of the widespread spread of the virus has caused hundreds of thousands of tests to accumulate in private U.S. laboratories, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents have become scarce.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: في مارس 2020 أبلغت الصين عن وجود مشكلات في دقة أطقم الاختبار لديها.
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported problems with the accuracy of its test crews.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: في الولايات المتحدة، وُجدت "عيوب" في أطقم الاختبار التي ابتكرتها سي دي سي؛ ومن ثم أزالت الحكومة الحواجز البيروقراطية التي حالت دون إجراء الاختبار بشكل خاص. واشترت إسبانيا أطقم اختبار من الشركة الصينية Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology المحدودة، لكنها وجدت أن النتائج كانت غير دقيقة.
en-mt: In the United States, there were "flaws" in the test kits created by the CDC; the government removed bureaucratic barriers that specifically prevented testing. Spain purchased test kits from Chinese company Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Ltd, but found the results to be inaccurate.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: أوضحت الشركة أن النتائج غير الصحيحة قد ترجع إلى الإخفاق في جمع العينات أو في عدم استخدام الأطقم بطريقة صحيحة.
en-mt: The company explained that incorrect results may be due to failure to collect samples or to not using the kits correctly.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: صرحت الوزارة الإسبانية بأنها ستتراجع عن شراء الأطقم التي أعطت نتائج غير صحيحة، وستستبدلها بأطقم اختبار أخرى من Shenzhen Bioeasy.أعطى 80% من أطقم الاختبار التي اشترتها جمهورية التشيك من الصين نتائج خاطئة. اشترت سلوفاكيا 1.2 مليون طقم اختبار من الصين تبين أنها غير دقيقة.
en-mt: The Spanish ministry has stated that it will withdraw the purchase of kits that gave incorrect results, and will replace them with other test kits from Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of the test kits purchased by the Czech Republic from China gave false results. Slovakia bought 1.2 million test kits from China that turned out to be inaccurate.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
